# plainText

**Type Property**

An option to allow only plain text without any attributes in the returned text.

## Declaration

```swift
static var plainText: NSWritingToolsResultOptions { get }
```

## Getting the output options

- **richText**: An option to include style attributes consistent with the RTF format in the returned text.
- **list**: An option to allow list-style formatting in the returned text.
- **table**: An option to allow tabular layout attributes in the returned text.
